General.Name: GavYam Lands Corp Ltd
General.Description: Gav-Yam Lands Corp. Ltd operates as a real estate company in Israel. It initiates, plans, constructs, develops, leases, maintains, and manages high-tech, and industrial and commercial parks and centers, offices, logistic centers, and residential neighborhoods. The company was formerly known as Bayside Land Corporation Ltd and changed its name to Gav-Yam Lands Corp. Ltd in June 2021. Gav-Yam Lands Corp. Ltd was founded in 1928 and is based in Haifa, Israel. As of June 6, 2022 Gav-Yam Lands Corp. Ltd (TASE : GVYM) operates as a subsidiary of Property & Building Corp. Ltd.
